TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_i_2018_a_mihcan_a_nipalamal, title = i_2018_a_mihcan_a_nipalamal, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/i_2018_a_mihcan_a_nipalamal} }

S.FORM: i ayaw nu luma' idaw ku nipadungus atu i labu nu lalami u misalukyaway nu pinacadan nanay u tuas hani piadih hantu palaw a mituek tu nipatata mamin padungus tu tuas tuduhen ku nipatata atu luma' sipakelit tu tuas cacay a mihcaan kina cacay palamal atu padungus tu tuas milunuc sapipupu tu pinacadan kya ama balud kya a madutus nu pinacadan ku lalangawan atu nu tuasan a ingay.

i ayaw no loma' idaw ko nipadongos ato i labo no lalami o misalokyaway no pinacadan nanay o toas hani piadih hanto palaw a mitoek to nipatata mamin padongos to toas todohen ko nipatata ato loma' sipakelit to toas cacay a mihcaan kina cacay palamal ato padongos to toas milonoc sapipopo to pinacadan kya ama balod kya a madotos no pinacadan ko lalangawan ato no toasan a ingay.
